title: Stylish City Escape in Germany's Rhineland 30 Minutes from Cologne with River Views
description: Discover Beethoven’s home city of Bonn with this riverside escape right in the heart of Germany's Rhineland. Once popular among nobles in the 19th century and a meeting place for politicians between the 50s and 70s, the hotel's rich history is reflected in its classic yet modern interior. Unwind in the Vitality Spa and fitness area or enjoy Ristorante Oliveto's authentic Italian cuisine over dreamy river views from the terrace, before exploring the city's charming old town.
